Policy.Description: Edmund O. Schweitzer III of Computer Science with position title Associate Chair is delegated to Disapprove by Computer Science Department Chair

Rule.Description: Edmund O. Schweitzer III of Computer Science with position title Associate Chair can "Edit" "Certification/Signatures" when Delegated by Computer Science Department Chair with position title "Department Chair" and ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL

Edmund O. Schweitzer III of Computer Science with position title Associate Chair can "Approve" a "Whole Proposal" when Delegated by Computer Science Department Chair with position title "Department Chair" and ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL and where condition check all department chairs are not approved.

AttributeAssignmentExpression.AttributeValue: preobligation
You need to sign the proposal first!
postobligation
Hello User,&lt;br/&gt;&lt;br/&gt;The proposal has been approved by Department Chair. Now it is waiting for another Department Chair approval. &lt;br/&gt;&lt;br/&gt;Thank you, &lt;br/&gt; GPMS Team
Your proposal has been approved by:

Rule.Description: Edmund O. Schweitzer III of Computer Science with position title Associate Chair can "Approve" a "Whole Proposal" when Delegated by Computer Science Department Chair with position title "Department Chair" and ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL and where condition check all department chairs are not approved and no IRB is required.
